Santa_Monica.Gateway West Building:
Gateway West Building was a skyscraper in Century City, Los Angeles, California.


== Location ==
The Gateway West Building was located on the southwest corner of Santa Monica Boulevard and the Avenue of the Stars in Century City, a suburb of Los Angeles.


== History ==
Completed in 1963, Gateway West was the first building erected in Century City—an architectural plan that converted the back lot of 20th Century Fox into a modern neighbourhood with skyscrapers.
